name: Jonathan Steele
title: Jonathan Steele | Software Engineer
about: Hard of Hearing Experienced Software Engineer with a strong track record of building business solutions that drive efficiency and innovation. Skilled in C++, C#, Java, Python, Swift, Kotlin, Android, iOS, Vue, Git, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, Excel, and more. Developed a mobile app serving 100+ daily users and automated business workflows using Shell Scripting, reducing errors and saving time.
